itunes:title: S3, E1: The Daystar Story
title: S3, E1: The Daystar Story
itunes:author: That Sounds Fun Network
itunes:subtitle: The Raising Boys and Girls podcast is back with bonus episodes to help you finish 2020 strong! Join Sissy Goff, David Thomas, and Melissa Trevathan this week as they share the Daystar Counseling Ministries story. Hear how it all began over 30 years...
itunes:summary:
The Raising Boys and Girls podcast is back with bonus episodes to help you finish 2020 strong! Join Sissy Goff, David Thomas, and Melissa Trevathan this week as they share the Daystar Counseling Ministries story. Hear how it all began over 30 years ago with a vision to help kids see just how special they are and encourage them to help each other shine.

Grab links, verses, and quotes you want to remember in the show notes at www.gominno.com/blog/raising-boys-and-girls-podcast-daystar-story.

Connect with Sissy, David, and Melissa at raisingboysandgirls.com.

Connect with Minno at podcast.gominno.com.

The Raising Boys and Girls podcast is back with bonus episodes to help you finish 2020 strong! Join Sissy Goff, David Thomas, and Melissa Trevathan this week as they share the Daystar Counseling Ministries story. Hear how it all began over 30 years ago with a vision to help kids see just how special they are and encourage them to help each other shine.

Grab links, verses, and quotes you want to remember in the show notes at www.gominno.com/blog/raising-boys-and-girls-podcast-daystar-story.
